author: Ainy Cormac
description:
Molten Flux by Jonathan Weiss, the opening chapter in his Flux Catastrophe series, is a high-octane thrill ride full of grit, violence and some truly mind-bending worldbuilding. Think Mad Max and Red Faction with magic.  We follow Ryza, a young man whose wandering trade caravan is captured at the novel’s opening by smelters, death-dealers of […]

The post REVIEW: Molten Flux by Jonathan Weiss appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Molten Flux by Jonathan Weiss
